LanguageData.MMTank_Buggy.label: Buggy
LanguageData.MMTank_Buggy.description:
Buggy car that can carry multiple people.
It was carefully maintained at a certain factory, so it is more friendly than a van.
Buggy like flowers.
In his spare time, he uses an uncooled land mine detector to search for nearby iron scraps and electronic components, but it's not cold enough to find them.
LanguageData.MMTank_Buggy.tools.0.label: Hunter magic
